00029 class module extends simbio
00030 {
00031     private $modules_dir = 'modules';
00032     private $module_table = 'mst_module';
00033     public $module_list = array();
00034     public $appended_first = '<li><a class="menu" href="index.php">Home</a></li><li><a class="menu" href="../index.php" title="View OPAC in New Window" target="_blank">OPAC</a></li>';
00035     public $appended_last = '<li><a class="menu" href="logout.php">LOGOUT</a></li>';
00036 
00037 
00044     public function setModulesDir($str_modules_dir)
00045     {
00046         $this->modules_dir = $str_modules_dir;
00047     }
00048 
00049 
00056     public function generateModuleMenu($obj_db)
00057     {
00058         // get module data from database
00059         $_mods_q = $obj_db->query('SELECT * FROM '.$this->module_table);
00060         while ($_mods_d = $_mods_q->fetch_assoc()) {
00061             $this->module_list[] = array('name' => $_mods_d['module_name'], 'path' => $_mods_d['module_path'], 'desc' => $_mods_d['module_desc']);
00062         }
00063 
00064         // create the HTML Hyperlinks
00065         $_menu = '<ul id="menuList">';
00066         $_menu .= $this->appended_first;
00067         // sort modules
00068         if ($this->module_list) {
00069             foreach ($this->module_list as $_module) {
00070                 $_formated_module_name = ucwords(str_replace('_', ' ', $_module['name']));
00071                 $_mod_dir = $_module['path'];
00072                 if (isset($_SESSION['priv'][$_module['path']]['r']) AND $_SESSION['priv'][$_module['path']]['r'] AND file_exists($this->modules_dir.$_mod_dir)) {
00073                     $_menu .= '<li><a class="menu'.( (isset($_GET['mod']) AND $_GET['mod']==$_module['path'])?' menuCurrent':'' ).'" title="'.$_module['desc'].'" href="index.php?mod='.$_mod_dir.'">'.__($_formated_module_name).'</a></li>';
00074                 }
00075             }
00076         }
00077         $_menu .= $this->appended_last;
00078         $_menu .= '</ul>';
00079 
00080         return $_menu;
00081     }
00082 
00083 
00090     public function generateSubMenu($str_module = '')
00091     {
00092         global $dbs;
00093         $_submenu = '';
00094         $_submenu_file = $this->modules_dir.$str_module.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'submenu.php';
00095         if (file_exists($_submenu_file)) {
00096             include $_submenu_file;
00097         } else {
00098             include 'default/submenu.php';
00099         }
00100         // iterate menu array
00101         foreach ($menu as $_list) {
00102             if ($_list[0] == 'Header') {
00103                 $_submenu .= '<div class="subMenuHeader">'.$_list[1].'</div>';
00104             } else {
00105                 $_list_ID = str_replace(' ', '_', (strtolower($_list[0])));
00106                 $_submenu .= '<a class="subMenuItem" id="'.$_list_ID.'"'
00107                     .' onclick="setSubmenuClass(\''.$_list_ID.'\', \'curModuleLink\'); setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.$_list[1].'\', \'get\');"'
00108                     .' title="'.( isset($_list[2])?$_list[2]:$_list[0] ).'" href="#">'.$_list[0].'</a>';
00109             }
00110         }
00111         $_submenu .= '&nbsp;';
00112         return $_submenu;
00113     }
00114 }
